subject: Hey Order Nr #SSN4744
description_text:
Hey I already sent 2 emails and no one have said nothing 1 week ago 
Pls I need to cancel this order I cant take it For now it was a mistake from My part pls can you guys answer me PLS im asking 
Enviado do meu iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Andr? Nunes,    We apologize for not responding to you promptly. We will cancel your order. Could you please tell us the reason? It's important for us, thank you!

Its just the moment is not the rigth nothing abouth you its something person im sorry for that
Enviado do meu iPhone

No dia 23/12/2025, às 02:32, service@simsonn.com escreveu:

﻿
Hi Andr? Nunes,

We apologize for not responding to you promptly. We will cancel your order. Could you please tell us the reason? It's important for us, thank you!
Hi Andr? Nunes,    We're sorry to hear that. We'll cancel it for you.  Merry Christmas!

Thank you and sorry ??
Enviado do meu iPhone

No dia 24/12/2025, às 11:04, service@simsonn.com escreveu:

﻿
Hi Andr? Nunes,

We're sorry to hear that. We'll cancel it for you.
Merry Christmas!

Hey can I Ask something i think we can continue with the order im sorry about that of it possível to continue with the order, if the order is not cancel we can continue with it, i have resolve the problem and now if is possível we can continue the order im sorry about that
Enviado do meu iPhone
